document_data.name: Keegan
document_data.mainbody: '''Keegan''' was a woodsman who lived in a cottage in [[Llyrath Forest]] with his wife [[Enid]] and his son, [[Evan]].
document_data.Description: He was a middle-aged, work-worn man who dressed in simple clothes.
